titlestmt.titleproper:
Guide to the John Ramage Collection
circa 1808-1826
MS 3179
titlestmt.author: Elise Winks

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-12 14:17:10 -0400.

did.abstract: Irish painter and goldsmith John Ramage's personal library, containing about 127 volumes of published books. Includes classic titles such as Paradise Lost and books on religion, philosophy, and theater. Also includes pamphlets (2 envelopes) and photostats (1 envelope).
did.langmaterial: The documents in the collection are in English.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: The collection should be cited as: John Ramage collection, MS 3179, New-York Historical Society.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The collection is not processed. As part of a project conducted in 2019-20, archivist Elise Winks performed a high level survey of the collection and described it broadly in this preliminary finding aid.
